Dialogue.text: Aren't you coming?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: Going out right now might not be the best idea for me. Ha ha...

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: ( She looks tired. People on this floor are super weird. I should help her. )

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Why are you doing all this? everyone is hunting for you

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: It seems there was a time where I was a scientist. But right now, I doubt I'm one.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What do you mean?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: I...There was a situation and I got banned from project before the design of the experiment is done.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Then who are you? Why are you here?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: Just like when we first met. I'm the same as you.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What happened?

Dialogue.name: Emma
Dialogue.text: Soon, you'll know.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: This is a project called Underground. Just like the name of the project, this huge place is built underground

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: All these times...I'm... underground? What's all this for?

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: There seems to be a war currently going on above us.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: A war? But until now, even a military student like me have never heard any news about this.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Despite that, I see nothing war-related happening anywhere right now.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Ugh...it felt like I was being pushed up here

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: This place...feels like...in a war

Dialogue.name: People
Dialogue.text: To the left, for the left

Dialogue.name: People
Dialogue.text: Our hope... Our hope has come

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Congratulations, you have passed the test.

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: There is a person waiting for you.
What are you waiting for? Come on in, nothing to worry about.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: I should do what the butler told

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Is this...war?

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: We have been constrained beneath the war all along?

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: To the right way, to the right!

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: You have to go to the right way!

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Greetings Mr Elias. You have walked the wrong path. Hence...

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: I won't be able to let you pass

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What does that mean?

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: Ms. Emily has decided that you lack of humaneness.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: What does that even mean?!

Dialogue.name: Butler
Dialogue.text: My apologies.
What a shame. The subject named Elias is still imperfect.
... This is such an unfortunate event. They both were so close.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: This is the way to the military cantonment!

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: That must be my destination

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: Finally, we got a usable seed.

Dialogue.name: Elias
Dialogue.text: At last... we have accomplished something.
